org.apache.camel.impl

Class DefaultClassResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.camel.impl.DefaultClassResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CamelContextAware, ClassResolver

    public class DefaultClassResolver
extends Object
implements ClassResolver, CamelContextAware
    Default class resolver that uses regular class loader to load classes.
